specials_info:
Legions of Baron Harkyn
  Battle vs. [4x99 Berserker]

Statue of the Mad God
 Battle vs. [1 Mad God]
 If you have the EYE, you'll be teleported behind the gates to Kylearan's Tower.

An old man asks you a question in order to pass:

 What tavern lies off Night Archer?

 Answer: SKULL TAVERN
 Wrong: Battle vs. [1 Old Man, 2x2 Lesser Demons]
